Student Store: Student Store is an exclusive online marketplace designed for students, providing a platform to buy, sell, and borrow affordable, new or used items such as electronics, games, and study materials. With a focus on fostering a sense of community and resource-sharing, the website encourages students to list real information about their products. The platform, accessible on mobile and desktop Web, features, essential functionalities like user profiles, product listings, orders, and a donation page, creating a dedicated space where students can easily connect and fulfill their academic and personal needs.
